title: Born to build
brief_description: Bodybuilding is more than just moving heavy metal. To Alex it is his life. Fascinated as a child with size and strength and an addiction to Marvel comics Alex finally starting pumping iron at the age of 16 and became hooked. Follow his journey in this humourous comic book style presentation as he lifts those weights and pumps that iron to build the perfect body.
